title: UI Developer • Interaction Designer
description: Interested in the evolution of technology in our daily lives and how it’s affecting our behavior. Currently working as a UI/UX Designer with some Front-end Development based in NYC, experience with startup, private companies and creative agency. Alumnus from Altos de Chavón Parsons The New School and General Assembly coding bootcamp  In my free time, I like to explore the other side of the internet and mixed minimal house / techno for others to relax and dance.
